entry.source: "Well done, fellow Samurai, in your{F801}fight against the demons. Rest at the{F801}barracks and heal the day's wounds."{F801}{F802}〉 ...So the sign says.{F801}
entry.target: "Well done, fellow Samurai, in your{F801}fight against the demons. Rest at the{F801}barracks and heal the day's wounds."{F801}{F802}〉 ...So the sign says.{F801}

entry.source: "Praise be to the brave Samurai!{F801}And let us mourn our comrades who have{F801}fallen before achieving their goals."{F801}{F802}〉 ...So the sign says.{F801}
entry.target: "Praise be to the brave Samurai!{F801}And let us mourn our comrades who have{F801}fallen before achieving their goals."{F801}{F802}〉 ...So the sign says.{F801}

entry.source: "Beware the appearance of demons."{F801}...So the sign says.{F801}
entry.target: "Beware the appearance of demons."{F801}...So the sign says.{F801}

entry.source: "Go forth, fellow Samurai."{F801}{F802}"Those who descend these stairs and{F801}live to climb them again will be renowned{F801}as heroes."{F801}{F802}〉 ...So the sign says.{F801}
entry.target: "Go forth, fellow Samurai."{F801}{F802}"Those who descend these stairs and{F801}live to climb them again will be renowned{F801}as heroes."{F801}{F802}〉 ...So the sign says.{F801}

entry.source: "Suggestions for prentice Samurai:"{F801}{F802}"One, check your Gauntlet often."{F801}{F802}"Two, be mindful of your stamina.{F801}A single strike from a demon may be{F801}enough to slay."{F801}{F802}"Three, there is a limit to how many of{F801}a kind of item you can carry. Use them{F801}rather than take them to the grave."{F801}{F802}〉 ...So the sign says.{F801}
entry.target: "Suggestions for prentice Samurai:"{F801}{F802}"One, check your Gauntlet often."{F801}{F802}"Two, be mindful of your stamina.{F801}A single strike from a demon may be{F801}enough to slay."{F801}{F802}"Three, there is a limit to how many of{F801}a kind of item you can carry. Use them{F801}rather than take them to the grave."{F801}{F802}〉 ...So the sign says.{F801}

entry.source: "Mind what's at your feet."{F801}{F802}"Some say that new paths have been{F801}found by doing so."{F801}...So the sign says.{F801}
entry.target: "Mind what's at your feet."{F801}{F802}"Some say that new paths have been{F801}found by doing so."{F801}...So the sign says.{F801}

entry.source: "Only Samurai who have obtained this{F801}door's key have leave to pass through."{F801}{F802}〉 ...So the sign says.{F801}
entry.target: "Only Samurai who have obtained this{F801}door's key have leave to pass through."{F801}{F802}〉 ...So the sign says.{F801}

entry.source: "Mind what is above you."{F801}{F802}"Some say that new paths have been{F801}found by doing so."{F801}...So the sign says.{F801}
entry.target: "Mind what is above you."{F801}{F802}"Some say that new paths have been{F801}found by doing so."{F801}...So the sign says.{F801}

entry.source: "Beware... Injuries may occur in even{F801}the most familiar battles."{F801}...So the sign says.{F801}
entry.target: "Beware... Injuries may occur in even{F801}the most familiar battles."{F801}...So the sign says.{F801}

entry.source: "Waste Storage Manager: Hope"{F801}...So the sign says.{F801}
entry.target: "Waste Storage Manager: Hope"{F801}...So the sign says.{F801}

entry.source: "Paths are meant to be cut open."{F801}{F802}"If you come across a new wall and find{F801}yourself lost, training against a wall{F801}is one idea!"{F801}{F802}"It may even lead to a new path."{F801}{F802}〉 ...So the sign says.{F801}
entry.target: "Paths are meant to be cut open."{F801}{F802}"If you come across a new wall and find{F801}yourself lost, training against a wall{F801}is one idea!"{F801}{F802}"It may even lead to a new path."{F801}{F802}〉 ...So the sign says.{F801}

entry.source: "Be wary of poison up ahead."{F801}...So the sign says.{F801}
entry.target: "Be wary of poison up ahead."{F801}...So the sign says.{F801}

entry.source: "A treatment for poison:"{F801}{F802}"Those who find themselves poisoned{F801}should use a Detox Solution."{F801}{F802}〉 ...So the sign says.{F801}
entry.target: "A treatment for poison:"{F801}{F802}"Those who find themselves poisoned{F801}should use a Detox Solution."{F801}{F802}〉 ...So the sign says.{F801}

entry.source: "Upon finding relics, take them promptly{F801}to Q's Blacksmith or B's Apothecary."{F801}{F802}〉 ...So the sign says.{F801}
entry.target: "Upon finding relics, take them promptly{F801}to Q's Blacksmith or B's Apothecary."{F801}{F802}〉 ...So the sign says.{F801}

entry.source: "Beware the hazards of falling."{F801}...So the sign says.{F801}
entry.target: "Beware the hazards of falling."{F801}...So the sign says.{F801}

entry.source: "Passage forbidden."{F801}{F802}"Across this bridge is the forbidden land.{F801}Obey the code."{F801}{F802}〉 ...So the sign says.{F801}
entry.target: "Passage forbidden."{F801}{F802}"Across this bridge is the forbidden land.{F801}Obey the code."{F801}{F802}〉 ...So the sign says.{F801}

entry.source: "Opening the door ahead is strictly{F801}forbidden."{F801}...So the sign says.{F801}
entry.target: "Opening the door ahead is strictly{F801}forbidden."{F801}...So the sign says.{F801}

entry.source: "From here on is within the bedrock."{F801}...So the mystic script says.{F801}
entry.target: "From here on is within the bedrock."{F801}...So the mystic script says.{F801}

entry.source: "Smoking in the pit is forbidden."{F801}...So the mystic script says.{F801}
entry.target: "Smoking in the pit is forbidden."{F801}...So the mystic script says.{F801}

entry.source: "There is a danger of encountering{F801}angels from above on. Do not approach."{F801}{F802}〉 ...So the mystic script says.{F801}
entry.target: "There is a danger of encountering{F801}angels from above on. Do not approach."{F801}{F802}〉 ...So the mystic script says.{F801}

entry.source: "Look, the ceiling is almost there.{F801}Do not lose your life over a foolish accident."{F801}{F802}〉 ...So the mystic script says.{F801}
entry.target: "Look, the ceiling is almost there.{F801}Do not lose your life over a foolish accident."{F801}{F802}〉 ...So the mystic script says.{F801}

entry.source: "Don't give up. Recall the blue skies."{F801}{F802}〉 ...So the mystic script says.{F801}
entry.target: "Don't give up. Recall the blue skies."{F801}{F802}〉 ...So the mystic script says.{F801}

entry.source: "From here on is below the ceiling.{F801}Be careful of rockslides. Take care not{F801}to destroy our future."{F801}{F802}〉 ...So the mystic script says.{F801}
entry.target: "From here on is below the ceiling.{F801}Be careful of rockslides. Take care not{F801}to destroy our future."{F801}{F802}〉 ...So the mystic script says.{F801}

entry.source: "Always wear a safety harness when{F801}working in high places."{F801}{F802}〉 ...So the mystic script says.{F801}
entry.target: "Always wear a safety harness when{F801}working in high places."{F801}{F802}〉 ...So the mystic script says.{F801}

entry.source: "The smallest bit of carelessness can{F801}cause accidents."{F801}{F802}〉 ...So the mystic script says.{F801}
entry.target: "The smallest bit of carelessness can{F801}cause accidents."{F801}{F802}〉 ...So the mystic script says.{F801}
